issue.title: Create tutorial on how to use GzWeb's SDF viewer

content.raw:
I've used the example and made a tutorial explaining the demo, but I can't make the PR right now because I'm unable to clone the `gazebo_tutorials` repo because my internet is currently super slow. [apparently I've to clone the repo if I were to add another folder, cant do that using the `bitbucke` gui`].

here it is https://bitbucket.org/mohamd_ayman/gazebo_tutorials-2/pull-requests/1/sdfviewer_example-tutorial/diff
